verbs.description: If [ARG1: President Trump] [V: were] [ARG2: my client] , I would make Robert Mueller crawl over hot coals to the Supreme Court and back before giving up a scrap of paper .
If President Trump were my client , I [V: would] make Robert Mueller crawl over hot coals to the Supreme Court and back before giving up a scrap of paper .
[ARGM-ADV: If President Trump were my client] , [ARG0: I] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: make] [ARG1: Robert Mueller crawl over hot coals to the Supreme Court and back before giving up a scrap of paper] .
If President Trump were my client , [ARG0: I] would make Robert Mueller crawl over hot coals to the Supreme Court and back before [V: giving] up [ARG1: a scrap of paper] .
